targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  *
FROM vehicles
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  vehicles.vin = '${VIN}'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  logtime,
  log FROM
(
  (SELECT
    started AS logtime,
    'charging started' AS log
  FROM charging_sessions
  WHERE started IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY started DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    connected AS logtime,
    'charger connected' AS log
  FROM charging_sessions
  WHERE connected IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY connected DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    locked AS logtime,
    'connector locked' AS log
  FROM charging_sessions
  WHERE locked IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY locked DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
    (SELECT
    ended AS logtime,
    'charging ended' AS log
  FROM charging_sessions
  WHERE ended IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY ended DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    disconnected AS logtime,
    'charger disconnected' AS log
  FROM charging_sessions
  WHERE disconnected IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY disconnected DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    unlocked AS logtime,
    'connector unlocked' AS log
  FROM charging_sessions
  WHERE unlocked IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY unlocked DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    date AS logtime,
    'car was refueled' AS log
  FROM refuel_sessions
  WHERE date IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY date DESC
  LIMIT 3)
   UNION
  (SELECT
    "startDate" AS logtime,
    'trip started' AS log
  FROM trips
  WHERE "startDate" IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY "startDate" DESC
  LIMIT 10)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    "endDate" AS logtime,
    'trip ended' AS log
  FROM trips
  WHERE "endDate" IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY "endDate" DESC
  LIMIT 10)
  UNION
  (SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS logtime,
  CASE WHEN "climatisationState"= 'OFF' THEN 'climatisation stopped'
       WHEN "climatisationState"= 'HEATING' THEN 'climatisation heating'
       WHEN "climatisationState"= 'COOLING' THEN 'climatisation cooling'
       WHEN "climatisationState"= 'VENTILATION' THEN 'climatisation ventilating'
       ELSE 'unkown'
  END AS log
FROM
  (SELECT
        "carCapturedTimestamp",
        "climatisationState",
        LAG("climatisationState") OVER (ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp") AS "beforeClimatisationState",
        'climatisation started' AS log
      FROM climatization
      WHERE "carCapturedTimestamp" IS NOT NULL AND "climatisationState" IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
        AND "climatisationState" IN ('OFF', 'HEATING', 'COOLING', 'VENTILATION')
      ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp" DESC
    ) AS climatization
  WHERE "climatisationState" != "beforeClimatisationState"
  ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp" DESC
  LIMIT 10)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    start AS logtime,
    'New warning: '||text AS log
  FROM warning_lights
  WHERE start IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY start DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    "end" AS logtime,
    'Warning gone: '||text AS log
  FROM warning_lights
  WHERE "end" IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY "end" DESC
  LIMIT 3)
) AS logs
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT
  COUNT(*)>2 AS has_error
FROM weconnect_errors
WHERE datetime > (NOW() - INTERVAL '30 MINUTES')

panels.title: Information

panels.description: Status of the car ${VIN:text} with VIN ${VIN:raw}
panels.title: Live Status

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC
  ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC END AS "Electric Range"
FROM vehicles
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  vehicles.vin = '$VIN'

panels.description: Remaining time until climatization is turned off
panels.title: Remaining Climatization Time

list.definition: SELECT "vin" || ':' || "nickname" || ' (' || "model" || ' - ' || "carType" || ')' FROM vehicles LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.VIN = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin WHERE vehicle_settings.hide IS NOT True ORDER BY vehicle_settings.sorting_order ASC
